::Stratus::

Stratus pulls himself out of the water onto the island and transforms back into robot mode. He walks over to the other Decepticons, looking around and waiting for orders.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Breakdown and Wildrider finally find the island, and swoop up gracefully
> landing standing up, and quickly rush over to join their comerades.
> Wildrider looks to Dragstrip, and began to grin like a madman, "Yeah ha,
> we'll make this place look like a wheel burn." he cried out. He then
> looked at Dead-End's pecemistic view. "Maybe, but at least he'll go out
> in a crash and burn." he said getting pretty worked up. Breakdown was
> looking around nervously however.
> 
> He was nervously looking around, and when he caught Astrotrain's eyes,
> thought it best to speak. "So we have to do some aquariaticral work?" he
> asked Astrotrain.
> 
> Sinnertwin had found something, the sent of an animal perhaps, he
> thought to himself. He moved off away from the group, making a lot of
> noise as he did. The hissing grunting and growling mass of yellow
> reptile made his way towards a forest. "Smell from in there." one head
> notted. The other nodded, "Small creatures, lots of them." the other
> chimed in nervously. Then they both curled up backwards nervously, "WE
> HATE." and heat began to build in both mouths, as they jutted their
> heads foward sharply, emmiting two streams of searing flame towards the
> bushes. Emidiatly when the heads were down, the cannon on his back
> flamed to life, and began spouting random balls of fire into the canopy
> of trees. The first few bushes immidiatly caught on fire, and began to
> spread, whereas the ones caught directly in the stream of inferno simply
> disapeared in smoke.
